name: Accelerator Pistol, Standard (StdAcP-10)
description: Standard accelerator pistol.The weapon fires a projectile at a low initial velocity; after it leaves the barrel, an internal charge accelerates the bullet to greater velocities. Accelerator weapons have low recoil and are well adapted to zero-G environments.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 1 : Characters and Combat
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
